quote: Peeda tab gahre arth dhoondhti hai jab asvikar khatam ho jata hai.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Shant palon mein satya andar se ubhar kar samne aata hai.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Jagrit vyakti uljhan ke samne bhi khula rehne ka sahas rakhta hai.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Jab ahankaar vinamrata ko apnata hai, tab gyaan prakat hota hai.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Parivartan ke samay mein sthir rehne ke liye apni chetna ko yahan aur ab mein sthir karo.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Samajhne ke madhyam se hi tumhe arogya milega, na ki aakalan se.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Karuna swayam aur doosron ke beech ke bhram ko mitati hai.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Jeevan ko manch par khelne ke bajaye balcony se dekhte raho.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Jo virodh karta hai, wahi sthayi hota hai. Jo samarpit hota hai, wahi parivartan lata hai.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Vishwas rakho ki tumhari zaruratein divya samay mein puri hongi.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Andhakaar kewal chetna ki anupasthiti hai, aur kuch nahi.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Shanti tab prakat hoti hai jab tum vastavikta se ladna chhod dete ho.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Bahari parivartan lana ho to apni andar ki drishti badlo.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Anand tab bhay aur krodh ko mita deta hai jab chetna bhram par vijay paati hai.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Jo Zen tum pahaadon par dhoondhte ho, wahi Zen tum apne saath le jaate ho.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Aakalan doosron ko alag banata hai, karuna swayam ko prakat karti hai.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Sab kuch tab badalta hai jab tum khud badalte ho.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Vishwas ke saath anandmay yatra karo. Baaki sab raaste bhramit karte hain.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Chetna samajh ka swagat karti hai; ninda agyaan ka swagat karti hai.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Har mukhote ke peeche satya chhupa hota hai.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Dhyan tay karta hai ki hum tikte hain ya girte hain.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Do vyakti jo karte hain wahi sansaar ko roop dete hain.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Shabdon ka sanket hota hai, lekin maun parivartan lata hai.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Samajh ahankaar ko mitata hai.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Dukh ko dhairya ke saath sahna aatmik unnati ki or le jata hai.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Dosharopan peeda ko majboot banata hai. Kshama use mitata hai.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Abhyas ke madhyam se hum un seemaon ko paar karte hain jo humne kabhi sochi bhi nahi thi.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Har haani apne saath saman labh ka beej lekar aati hai. Jeevan ke bade yojan par vishwas rakho.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Anand man ke shor ke neeche pratiksha karta hai.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Dharna ko jhootha maan kar aakalan karna satya ko chhupaye rakhta hai. Sabhi dharna ka swagat karna vastavikta ko prakat karta hai.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Divyata ke avashyak tareeke adbhut parinaam laate hain.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Antarik samvad ko shant karo taaki divya gyaan ko jaan sako.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Bhed ek hi satya ko vyakt karte hain.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Apne andar dhyan aur imaandari ke saath dekho. Tumhe wahi milega jo tum dhoondh rahe ho.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Divyata vicharon ke madhya ke shant antaralon mein prakat hoti hai.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Agyat par vishwas asambhavit phal lata hai.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Anand tab utpann hota hai jab dhyan 'paane' se 'hone' ki or shift hota hai.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Samanvay wo geet hai jo anant kaal gaata hai.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Apni chetna mein sabhi praaniyon ko dekho.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Spashtata man ke machalte samudra ko shant karti hai.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Divyata prapt nahi hoti, use pehchana jata hai.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Satya vibhajan se nahi, samaveshan se prakat hota hai.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Sahas banaye rakho. Jo aaj andhera lagta hai, wahi agle prabhat ka parda hai.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Vichar aur dharnaayein bandh deti hain. Upasthiti mukt karti hai.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Bhay pravah ko rokh leta hai. Prem use mukt karta hai.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Gyaani apne kendrit dhyan ke madhyam se andheri raahon ko roshan karte hain.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Shaanti ka arth vyatpatti se mukt hona nahi, balki ashanti ke beech sthir rehna hai.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Ichha se nahi, ichha ke saath apne sambandh se alag ho jao.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Kshama karo, doosron ke liye nahi balki apne liye.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Beete hue ko chhodne se naye sambhavnayein darwaza kholti hain.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Man ek ko vibhaajit karne ka bhram paida karta hai.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Aakalan satya ko dhundhla karta hai. Karuna samajh ko spasht karti hai.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Chetna woh talwar hai jo aasakti ko kaat deti hai.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Koi bhi shabd param satya ko vyakt nahi karte.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Mukti tabhi sambhav hai jab hum vastavikta ko apnate hain.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Jitna tum 'jo hai' usse door bhagne ki koshish karte ho, utni hi jeevan ki peeda badhti hai.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Samajh se karuna aati hai. Karuna se parivartan hota hai.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Hani ko apnane se roopantaran hota hai.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Drishti jaise-jaise vistrit hoti hai, vastavikta swayam prakat hoti hai.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Sachi udarta kuch bhi pratyashit nahi karti.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Jeevan mein halka safar karo. Sirf wahi rakho jo zarurat hai.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Sabhi satya maun mein ek ho jaate hain.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Jab hum man ko shant karte hain, tab gyaan bolta hai.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Bhay ko paar karne se anand ka dwar khulta hai.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Drishti tab spasht hoti hai jab aakalan ko chhod diya jata hai.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Gyaan dukh sahne ke madhyam se pakta hai.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Swarg tab prakat hota hai jab hum narak ke astitva par vishwas karna chhod dete hain.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Bin kisi hastakshep ki chetna ahankaar ko mitati hai.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Mukti ka path kadam-dar-kadam khulta hai, ek saath nahi.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Ekta hi vastavikta hai. Vibhaajan bhram hai. Jagrit ho aur yaad karo.
author: Lord Shiva

quote: Jo vyakti apne dukh aur sukh ko ek saman sah leta hai aur apni aatmik pragati mein dridh rahata hai, wahi mukti ke yogya hota hai.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Dharm ka arth Bhagwan ko jaanna aur unse prem karna hai.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: 'Krsna ke liye prem' ke lakshan ke roop mein guptata: 'Yeh kaha gaya hai ki yadyapi Srimati Radharani ne Krsna ke liye gahra prem viksit kiya, unhone apne bhaav ko apne hriday ke gaharaiyon mein chhupa liya taaki doosre unki sthiti ka pata na laga saken.'
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: 'Jo vyakti apne andar prasannata paata hai, jo andar se sakriya hota hai, jo andar hi anandit hota hai aur andar hi prakashit hota hai, wahi sahi arth mein siddh yogi hota hai. Wahi paramatma mein mukta hota hai aur antatah paramatma ko prapt karta hai.'
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: 'Hamari ekmatra zimmedari Bhagwan se prem karna hai, na ki apni zaruratein unse maangna.'
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Dharm bina darshan ke kewal bhavna hai, kabhi-kabhi andhbhakti. Aur darshan bina dharm ke kewal manasik kalpana hai.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Pratham shreni ka dharm wahi hai jo bina kisi swarth ke Bhagwan se prem karna sikhata hai. Agar main labh ke liye Bhagwan ki seva karta hoon, toh woh vyapar hai, prem nahi.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Aise bhramit vyakti samman aur apmaan, sukh aur dukh, stri aur purush, achhe aur bure jaise doiyon mein jeete hain, sochte hain 'Yeh meri patni hai; yeh mera ghar hai; main is ghar ka malik hoon; main is patni ka pati hoon.' Yeh bhram ke doiye hain. Jo log in doiyon mein uljhe hote hain, ve sampoorn moorkh hote hain aur isliye Param Ishwar ko samajh nahi sakte.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Hazaron logon mein koi ek siddhi ke liye prayatna karta hai, aur jo siddhi prapt karte hain unmein se mushkil se koi ek mujhe vastavik roop se jaanta hai.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Bhoutik log Krsna ko aatmik roop se samajh nahi paate. Isliye unhe shaaririk roopon par dhyan kendrit karne aur dekhne ki salah di gayi hai ki Krsna ka prakatikaran kaise hota hai.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Manushya ke liye man hi bandhan ka karan hai aur man hi mukti ka karan hai. Indriyon ke vishayon mein lipt man bandhan ka karan banta hai, aur indriyon ke vishayon se alag man mukti ka karan banta hai.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Ek yogi tapasvi se mahan hota hai, gyaan margi se mahan hota hai aur karm margi se mahan hota hai. Isliye, Arjun, har paristhiti mein yogi bano.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Mere priye Arjun, kewal akhand bhakti se mujhe samjha ja sakta hai jaise main hoon, tumhare samaksh khada hoon. Aur isi tarah mujhe seedha dekha ja sakta hai. Sirf isi tarike se tum mere gyaan ke rahasya mein pravesh kar sakte ho.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Indriya tripti ke liye rajasik vyakti samaj ya rashtra mein samman chahta hai, ek sukhmay parivaar chahta hai jisme achhe bachche, patni aur ghar ho. Yeh sab rajasik pravritti ke phal hain. Jab tak koi in cheezon ki ichha karta hai, tab tak use kathin mehnat karni padti hai. Isliye yah spasht kaha gaya hai ki aise vyakti apne karmo ke phalon se juda rehta hai aur unhi karmo mein bandh jata hai.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Ek vinamra gyaani sahi gyaan ke bal par ek vidwaan aur sajjan brahman ko, ek gaay ko, ek haathi ko, ek kutte ko aur ek chandala (kutte khane wale) ko saman drishti se dekhta hai.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Bhakti seva maya shakti ke viruddh yudh ka ek prakashan hai.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Koi bhi vyakti vastavik gyaan ke bindu tak bina us sahi vyakti ki madad ke nahi pahuch sakta jo pehle hi us gyaan mein sthapit ho chuka ho.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Paapmay jeevan se mukti ka ek hi saral upaay hai: agar tum Ka ke samarpit ho jao. Yahi bhakti ka aarambh hai.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Apne aap ko kabhi akela mat samjho, kyunki Bhagwan hamesha tumhare saath hain.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Kshatriya, jo dukhiyon ki raksha karne ke yogya hai, rajya chalane ke liye bana hai. Aparikshit, nimn varg ke log ya jo dukhiyon ki raksha karne ki ichha nahi rakhte, unhe shasak ke roop mein nahi bithana chahiye. Durbhagya se Kali-yuga mein nimn varg ke log bina prashikshan ke janmat se shasak ban jaate hain aur dukhiyon ki raksha karne ke bajaye sabhi ke liye asahniya paristhiti paida karte hain. Aise shasak apne swarth ke liye nagrikon ki suvidhaon ka durupyog karte hain, aur isse dharti maa apne putron  manushya aur pashuon  ki dukhad sthiti dekhkar vilap karti hai.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Jeev Bhagwan ke saath apne sambandh ko bhool gaya hai, kyunki wo anadi kaal se bhoutik indriya tripti mein atik aakarshit raha hai.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: He Kunti putra, sukh aur dukh ka asthayi astitva aur unka samay par ant hona jaise sheet aur grishm ritu ka aana aur jaana hai. Yeh indriyon ke anubhav se utpann hote hain, he Bharat vanshi, aur inhe bina vyakul hue sahna seekhna chahiye.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Jo vyakti Supreme Lord ke baare mein sunta hai, unki mahima karta hai, unka chintan karta hai, unki puja karta hai ya kewal unka samman karta hai, Lord uske man se hazaron janmon ka sankraman mita dete hain.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Kali-yuga ke chaar bade dosh hain: (1) striyon ke saath avaid sambandh, (2) pashuon ki hatya, (3) nasha karna, (4) har prakaar ki anumanit jua khelna.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Puri shiksha pranali indriya tripti par kendrit hai, aur agar ek gyaani ispar vichar kare to use samajh aayega ki is yug ke bachchon ko jaan bujhkar jhooti shiksha ki bali chadhaya ja raha hai.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Tamogun mein vyakti gyaan se rahit hota hai, aur isliye uske sabhi karm vartamaan mein dukh dete hain aur uske baad use pashu jeevan ki or le jaate hain. Pashu jeevan hamesha dukhmay hota hai, yadyapi maya ke prabhav mein pashu ise samajh nahi paate. Pashuon ki hatya bhi tamogun ka parinaam hai. Jo log pashuon ko maarte hain ve nahi jaante ki bhavishya mein wahi pashu ek sharir lekar unhe maarenge. Yeh prakriti ka niyam hai.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Jo log Supreme Personality of Godhead ko samarpit hote hain ve kewal doosron ke kalyan, unnati aur sukh ke liye jeete hain. Ve kisi swarth ke liye nahi jeete.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: 'Supreme' par apna dhyan kendrit karna aur apna prem unhe arpan karna hi Krishna consciousness kaha jata hai.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: 'Lord' aur unke bhakt Vaikuntha lokon mein niwas karte hain aur ve sabhi shuddha-sattva (shuddha gunon) se yukt hote hain. Vaikuntha lok Vaishnavon ko atyant priya hote hain aur Bhagwan swayam apne bhakton ki madad karte hain taaki ve Bhagwat dham tak pahunch saken.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: 'Vaikuntha loka' mein kewal Bhagwan ki seva hoti hai, aur yeh seva kisi uddeshya se nahi hoti. Yadyapi har seva ka ek vishesh phal hota hai, lekin bhakt kabhi apni ichhaon ki poorti ke liye ichhuk nahi hote; unki ichha sirf divya prem seva mein poori hoti hai.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Aur kyunki aatma ka janm nahi hota, isliye uska koi ateet, vartamaan ya bhavishya nahi hai. Aatma anant, sadaiv vidyamaan aur prachin hai  iska arth hai ki uske astitva ka itihas mein koi praman nahi hai. Sharir ke bhram ke karan hum aatma ke janm adi ka itihas dhoondhte hain.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Jo vyakti cheezon ko jaise hain waise samajhne mein nipun aur buddhiman hote hain, ve Bhagwan ke shubh karm aur leelaon ko sunne aur gaane mein ruchi lete hain. Aise vyakti sabse uchit bhoutik vardaan, jaise mukti, ki bhi parvah nahi karte, to swarg ke sukh jaise chhote vardaan ki baat hi kya.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Jo vyakti teen prakaar ke dukhon ke beech bhi man se prabhavit nahi hota, sukh ke samay mein harshit nahi hota, aur jo aasakti, bhay aur krodh se mukt hota hai, use sthir buddhi wala muni kaha jata hai.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Phir bhi, tum yeh nahi keh sakte ki surya ki roshni surya nahi hai. Surya ke bina roshni kahan? Lekin saath hi, roshni surya bhi nahi hai. Yeh surya hai aur surya nahi hai  dono. Yeh hamari darshan shastra ki soch hai: Acintya-bhedbheda  asamajhne yogya bhed aur abhed. Bhoutik drishti se tum ek saath sakaratmak aur nakaratmak ko samajh nahi sakte. Lekin yeh aatmik vastavikta hai. Aur kyunki sab kuch Ka ki urja hai, Ka apne kisi bhi roop se swayam ko prakat kar sakte hain.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Swarth ya to swayam kendrit hota hai ya swayam vistrit.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Raja Yudhihira ne apne shankh Ananta-vijaya ko bajaya, aur Nakula aur Sahadeva ne Sughoa aur Maipupaka bajaye. K ke mahan dhanurdhar Raja, mahan yoddha ikha, Dhadyumna, Vira, Styaki jo vijayi the, Drupada, Draupad ke putra aur Subhadr ke balshali putra ne apne-apne shankh bajaye.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Sacche bhakt aur sant log hamesha is baat ki chinta karte hain ki logon ko bhoutik aur aatmik roop se kaise sukhi banaya jaye.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Humne kai dhanwan logon ko dekha hai, kai shaktishali logon ko dekha hai, kai prasiddh logon ko dekha hai, kai sundar logon ko dekha hai, kai vidwaan logon ko dekha hai aur kai sanyasi logon ko dekha hai jo bhoutik sampatti se alag hote hain. Lekin humne kabhi kisi ek vyakti ko nahi dekha jo Ka ki tarah asimit roop se dhanwan, shaktishali, prasiddh, sundar, gyaanvan aur alag ho.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Aatma gyaan se bhari hoti hai ya hamesha chetna se yukt hoti hai. Isliye chetna aatma ka lakshan hai. Agar koi vyakti hriday mein aatma ko na bhi paaye jahan wo sthit hoti hai, tab bhi chetna ke hone se aatma ki upasthiti samajhi ja sakti hai.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: 'Bhagavad-gt' ka vishay vara (param niyantrak), jva (niyantrit jeev), prakti (bhoutik prakriti), samay (srishti ka avadhi) aur karma (kriya) par charcha karta hai.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: 'Bhagavad-gt' ka adhyayan karke vyakti Supreme Lord ke prati sampoorn samarpit atma ban sakta hai aur shuddh bhakti seva mein lag sakta hai. Jab Bhagwan zimmedari lete hain tab vyakti sabhi prakaar ke bhoutik prayason se mukt ho jata hai.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: 'Vedic' sahitya aur 'Pur' sabhi bhoutik astitva ke andhakaar ko jeetne ke liye likhe gaye hain.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: 'Jo raat sabhi praaniyon ke liye hoti hai wahi swayam sanyamit vyakti ke liye jagran ka samay hoti hai; aur jo jagran ka samay sabhi praaniyon ke liye hota hai wahi antarmukhi muni ke liye raat hoti hai.'
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Yadi koi vyakti atyant ghinautam karm karta hai, lekin bhakti mein laga hua hai, to use pavitra maana jata hai kyunki uska sankalp sahi disha mein sthir hai.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Adhyatmik guru Bhagwan ke kripa ke pratinidhi hote hain. Isliye, jo vyakti bhoutik astitva ki agni mein jal raha hai, vah atma-sakshatkar prapt guru ke madhyam se Bhagwan ki kripa ki varsha prapt kar sakta hai. Guru apne shabdon ke madhyam se dukhit vyakti ke hriday mein pravesh karke divya gyaan ka sanchar karte hain jo kewal bhoutik astitva ki agni ko shant kar sakta hai.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Jo log apne karmo ke phalon ka anand lena chahte hain, ve kanjoos hain.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Jo log sandehon se utpann doiyon se pare hain, jin ka man andar laga hua hai, jo sadaiv sabhi jeevon ke kalyan mein vyast rahte hain aur jo sabhi paapon se mukt hain, ve Supreme mein mukti prapt karte hain.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Jo log yeh sawal karna shuru karte hain ki ve dukh kyun sah rahe hain ya ve kahan se aaye hain aur mrityu ke baad kahan jayenge, ve 'Bhagavad-gt' ko samajhne ke yogya shishya hote hain.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Bachche jaise galat marg par chalne mein saksham hote hain, waise hi striyan bhi adhogati ki or jhukne mein saksham hoti hain. Isliye bachchon aur striyon ko parivaar ke vriddh sadasyon dwara suraksha di jani chahiye. Vibhinn dharmik kriyaon mein striyon ko lagane se ve vyabhichar ki or nahi jati hain. Chanakya Pandit ke anusaar, striyan aam taur par adhik buddhiman nahi hoti aur isliye un par vishwas nahi kiya ja sakta. Isliye dharmik kriyaon ki parivaarik parampara unhe sadaiv vyast rakhegi aur unki pavitrata aur bhakti ek achhi santaan ko janm degi jo varnashrama mein yogya hoga.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Jeev kisi bhi awastha mein sampoorn chetna nahi ho sakta, aur yeh sochna ki wo ho sakta hai ek bhramit siddhant hai. Wo chetan ho sakta hai, lekin sampoorn ya param chetan nahi.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Bhagwan Ka ne apna shankh Pcajanya bajaya; Arjuna ne Devadatta bajaya; aur Bhma, jo ati bhojan karte the aur mahan karm karne wale the, ne apna bhayankar shankh Paura bajaya.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: 'Sharir aur man' atma ke bahari avaran matra hain. Atma ki avashyaktaon ko pura karna zaruri hai. Sirf pakshi ke pinjre ko saaf karne se pakshi santusht nahi hota; pakshi ki asli avashyaktaon ko samajhna zaruri hai.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: 'Bhakti seva' ka marg hamesha safal hota hai.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: 'Bhagwan ke bhakt' Bhagwan se bhi adhik dayalu hote hain kyunki ve Bhagwan ke uddeshya ko samajhte hain. Isliye ve sabhi prakaar ke jokhim uthate hain, yahaan tak ki agyaan logon tak pahunchne ka prayas bhi karte hain taaki unhe Krishna chetna mein lagaya ja sake, jo manushya jeevan ke liye atyant avashyak hai.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Jo jeev janm aur mrityu ke jatil jaalon mein uljhe hue hain, ve kewal Krishna ka pavitra naam anjaane mein bhi jap kar turant mukt ho sakte hain, jo bhay ko bhi darata hai.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Bhagavad-gt ka adhyayan karke agar koi vyakti Krishna ke samarpit hone ka nirnay karta hai, to wo turant sabhi paap karmo ke prabhav se mukt ho jata hai.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Yeh bhoutik prakriti meri nimn prakriti hai, lekin isse pare ek aur prakriti hai  jva-bhtm, jo jeev hain.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Bhagwan humein apne dham mein wapas le jane ke liye humse adhik utsuk hain jitna hum chaahte hain. Adhikansh log waapas Bhagwan ke paas jaane ki ichha nahi rakhte. Sirf kuch hi log aisa chaahte hain. Lekin jo koi Bhagwan ke dham mein jaane ki ichha karta hai, Shri Krishna uski har tarah se madad karte hain.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: ...sirf ek moorkh chamatkar par vishwas karega kyunki  maan lijiye aap ek bachche hain aur ek vyakti is table ko uthata hai. Yeh ek chamatkar hai. Ya aap ek rasayan shastri hain aur aap acid aur base ko milate hain aur dhuan ya visfot hota hai. Kisi agyaani vyakti ke liye yeh chamatkar hai. Lekin har cheez ke peeche ek prakriya hoti hai, aur jab aap chamatkar dekhte hain, to yeh kewal us prakriya ki agyaanata hoti hai. Isliye sirf ek moorkh chamatkaron par vishwas karega...
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Tumhe apne nirdharit kartavya karne ka adhikar hai, lekin apne karmo ke phalon par adhikar nahi. Kabhi apne kriyaon ke parinaam ka karan mat samjho, aur kabhi apne kartavya na karne mein aasakti mat rakho.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Jo vyakti bhoutik paristhitiyon se atyadhik prabhavit hote hain unmein manasik santulan ka nuksan hota hai.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Krishna chetna mein sthit vyakti apne astitva mein shuddh hota hai, aur isliye uska koi sambandh nahi hota kisi bhi karm se jo paanch karanon  karta, karma, paristhiti, prayatna aur bhaagya  par nirbhar karta ho.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Sabse abhaagyashali vyakti nirakarvadi hote hain jo adhyatmik jagat ki divya vividhta ko samajh nahi paate. Ve Vaikuntha lokon ki sundarta par charcha karne se darte hain kyunki unka manna hai ki vividhta bhoutik honi chahiye.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: 'Jab hum bhoutik roop se pradushit hote hain tab hum 'conditioned' kehlate hain.' Jhooti chetna is bhram ke adheen hoti hai ki main bhoutik prakriti ka utpaad hoon. Isse jhoota ahankaar kaha jata hai.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: 'Hamari yeh prarthana hai ki aap Bhagavad-gt ko jaise hai waise hi padhne ka prayas karein.' Isse apni shiksha ke naam par bigaadne ka prayas mat karein. Krishna ko waise hi samajhne ka prayas karein jaise wo keh rahe hain; tabhi aapka jeevan safal hoga.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: 'Vednta-stra' mein jeev ko roshni ke roop mein varnit kiya gaya hai kyunki wo param roshni ka ang hai. Jaise surya ki roshni poore brahmand ko sthir rakhti hai, waise hi atma ki roshni is sharir ko sthir rakhti hai.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Kartavya ko poora karna chahiye, chahe isme thoda dukh hi kyun na ho. Isse tapasya ya austerity kehte hain. Tapasya ka arth hai ki sabhi khatron aur sankaton ke bawjood Krishna chetna ke apne kartavya mein aage badhna. Yeh tapasya hai, ya jeevan ki kathinaiyon ko swayam sweekar karna.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Jo vyakti param satya ka gyaan rakhta hai, he mahabali, wo indriyon aur indriya tripti mein nahi lagta, kyunki wo bhakti mein karm aur phal ke liye karm ke antar ko achhi tarah samajhta hai.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Sharirik drishti mein jeevan jeene wale vyakti ki sukh ki kalpana ek madhosh vyakti ke sukh jaise hoti hai.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Aadhunik manushya ne chand tak pahunchne ke liye bahut mehnat ki hai, lekin usne apne aatmik unnayan ke liye utni mehnat nahi ki.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: ...poorn samarpan ka bhaav ek pal mein prapt nahi hota, isliye hume turant Bhagwan ki kripa prakat hone ki apeksha nahi karni chahiye. Jabki Bhagwan aur kabhi-kabhi unke bhakt chamatkar karte hain, hume aise asadharan ghatnaon ki apeksha nahi rakhni chahiye. Nishchit roop se Bhagwan ki kripa humare samarpan se adhik hoti hai. Lekin agar hum turant unki poori kripa prapt kar lein, to hum bhrasht ho sakte hain jaise kai yogi hote hain jo apni siddhi se gir jate hain.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Hamari indriyan asampoorna hain. Hum apni aankhon par bahut garv karte hain. Aksar koi sawal karta hai, 'Kya tum mujhe Bhagwan dikha sakte ho?' Lekin kya tumhare paas Bhagwan ko dekhne wali aankhen hain? Agar ek pal mein andhera ho jaye, to tum apne haath tak nahi dekh sakte. To tumhare paas dekhne ki kya shakti hai?
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Is prakaar vyakti sab kuch jatil bana leta hai aur hamesha samasyaon mein hi rehta hai.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: 'tm' ya swayam padarth aur bhoutik tattvon se alag hai. Yeh apni rachna mein adhyatmik hai, aur isliye yeh kisi bhi bhoutik yojana se santusht nahi hota.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: 'Krishna chetna' mein sthit vyakti kisi manushya ya devata ka ashray nahi leta. Jo kuch bhi wo Krishna chetna mein karta hai wahi uske kartavya ka poora nirvah hota hai.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: 'Hamne kaha tha ki paanch tattvon (vara, jva, prakti, samay aur karma) mein se chaar shashwat hain, jabki karma shashwat nahi hai.'
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: 'Yoga ki siddhi shunyata ya nirakarvad mein samaapt nahi hoti; balki yoga ki siddhi tab prapt hoti hai jab koi vyakti Param Ishwar ko unke anant roop mein dekhta hai.'
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: 'Yeh laaj prakriti ka ek vardaan hai jo striyon ke saundarya aur pratishtha ko badhata hai.'
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: 'Manushyon par ahimsa aur pashuon par hinsa karna Shaitan ka siddhant hai.'
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: Sirf dridhata aur lagan ke saath kiye gaye karm hi safalta ka vishwas dilate hain.
author: Yajur Veda

quote: Achhe karm agar buri bhavnaon ke saath kiye jayein, to ve avashya asafal hote hain. Isliye humein durachar se door rehna chahiye.
author: Yajur Veda

quote: Humein tabhi bolna chahiye jab hamare vichar pavitra ho jayein aur man aur hriday shuddh ho chuke ho.
author: Yajur Veda

quote: Har vyakti ko saral aur sadachari jeevan jeena chahiye. Humein kabhi bhi chal kapat ka sahara nahi lena chahiye.
author: Yajur Veda

quote: Aushadhiyaan humein rog mukt karti hain aur sukh pradaan karti hain, bas unhe kushal chikitsak ke nirdesh par lena chahiye. Is prakriya se vyakti lambi aayu aur swasthya prapt karta hai.
author: Yajur Veda

quote: Vyakti ko aise karm karne chahiye jo swasthya aur shakti pradaan karein, taaki wo bina thake lambi samay tak karya kar sake.
author: Yajur Veda

quote: Dwesh aur krodh hamesha dukh, peeda aur asantosh laate hain. Isliye vyakti ko hamesha madhurvani bolni chahiye.
author: Yajur Veda

quote: Jab tak hum apni peeda ko mitane ka prayas nahi karte, tab tak hum dhanwan aur samruddh nahi ban sakte.
author: Yajur Veda

quote: Vyakti ko apni kshamata aur seema ke anusaar karya karna chahiye taaki wo param anand ko prapt kar sake.
author: Yajur Veda

quote: 'Satya' ko dabaaya nahi ja sakta aur wahi antim vijayi hota hai. Isliye humein sadaiv dharm ke path par chalna chahiye.
author: Yajur Veda

quote: 'Aap hi ve hain jo sabko unka kartavya karne ke liye prerana dete hain; main aapke kartavya ki prerana se prerit hoon; aap pratyaksh ya apratyaksh roop se is sansaar mein hone wale har karya mein shamil hain.'
author: Yajur Veda

quote: 'Vyakti ko apne sharir ko pavitra aur tejomay banane ke liye sab kuch karna chahiye  niyamit vyayam, swadhyaya adi. Jo yeh karta hai use lambi aayu aur tej prapt hota hai.'
author: Yajur Veda

quote: Jo log anushasit aur vyavasthit jeevan jeete hain, ve apne sabhi lakshyon ko prapt karte hain aur pragati karte hain.
author: Yajur Veda

quote: Manushya ke vyaktitva ki akarshan shakti uske antarik tej ka parinaam hoti hai.
author: Yajur Veda

quote: Keval ek nirdarsh bhay mukt vyakti swayam ke vikas ke liye aur samajik evam rajnitik vikas mein yogdan de sakta hai. Isliye vyakti ko nishchint hokar apne sabhi kartavya poore karne chahiye.
author: Yajur Veda

quote: Madhur vachan sabhi ko apni or akarshit karte hain, jabki kathor vaani logon ko door karti hai.
author: Yajur Veda

quote: Manushya jeevan ka param uddeshya paap mukt hona hai.
author: Yajur Veda

quote: Achhe vichar swayam hi achhe karmo mein parivartit hote hain.
author: Yajur Veda

quote: 'Vidwan aur gyaani vyakti ke shuddh man aur hriday se nikli hui vaani nadi ke jal ki tarah pavitra hoti hai.'
author: Yajur Veda

quote: 'Humein prerak vicharon ko apnana chahiye aur dharm ke path par chalna chahiye. Agar aisa kiya jaye to pragati nishchit hai.'
author: Yajur Veda

quote: 'Buddhi ke sudhar ke saath gyaan badhta hai, kyunki tab gyaan ko samajhna asaan ho jata hai.'
author: Yajur Veda

quote: 'Achhe vichar achhi pustakein padhkar aur unka manan chintan karke prapt kiye ja sakte hain.'
author: Yajur Veda

quote: 'Vyakti ko hamesha bal, bhojan aur lambi aayu mein vriddhi ki ichha rakhni chahiye, kyunki yeh sab ek dusre par nirbhar hote hain.'
author: Yajur Veda

quote: Atma adhyatmik anushasan ka kendriya bindu hai.
author: Mahavira

quote: Atma kewal tabhi mukti prapt kar sakti hai jab uspar jude sabhi karmo ko door kar diya jaye.
author: Mahavira

quote: Gun aur niyam anant hain.
author: Mahavira

quote: Swayam niyantran ka abhyas kuch tapasya ke saath shuru karo; upvaas se prarambh karo.
author: Mahavira

quote: Vastuon ki prakriti hi dharma hai.
author: Mahavira

quote: Kisi vyakti ko uske jeevanoparjan se vanchit mat karo. Yeh ek paapmay pravritti hai.
author: Mahavira

quote: Shraddha aur prarthana dono adrishya hain, lekin yeh asambhav ko sambhav banate hain.
author: Mahavira

quote: Sundarta sadaiv nahi tikti, lekin ek sundar hriday sadaiv amar rehta hai.
author: Mahavira

quote: 'Sab mere mitra hain. Mera koi shatru nahi hai.'
author: Mahavira

quote: 'Paryavaran ka sabse mahatvapurn siddhant yeh hai ki aap akela tatva nahi hain.'
author: Mahavira

quote: 'Sabhi atmaen saman aur ek jaise hain aur unka swabhav aur gun bhi saman hai.'
author: Mahavira

quote: 'Shanti tab shuru hoti hai jab apeksha samapt hoti hai.'
author: Mahavira

quote: Bhojan swayam niyantran ke maarg mein sabse bada badha hai; yeh alasya ko janm deta hai.
author: Mahavira

quote: Sabse sukhi vyakti dene wale hote hain, lene wale nahi.
author: Mahavira

quote: Sukh aur dukh, anand aur shok mein humein sabhi praaniyon ko apne swayam ke saman samajhna chahiye.
author: Mahavira

quote: Dusron ke vyavhaar ko apni antar shanti ko naash karne mat do.
author: Mahavira

quote: 'Jeeo aur jeene do; kisi ko chot mat pahunchao; jeevan sabhi praaniyon ke liye priya hai.'
author: Mahavira

quote: 'Krodh aur adhik krodh ko janm deta hai, jabki kshama aur prem aur adhik kshama aur prem ko janm dete hain.'
author: Mahavira

quote: 'Kisi bhi praani ya jeev ko chot mat pahunchao, gaali mat do, dabao, das banakar rakho, apmaan karo, ya maaro.'
author: Mahavira

quote: 'Na maaro, na dukh pahunchao. Ahimsa sabse mahaan dharm hai.'
author: Mahavira

quote: 'Jeevan mein sukh aur dukh, anand aur shok mein humein sabhi praaniyon ko apne saman samajhna chahiye.'
author: Mahavira

quote: 'Jo kuch bhi aapko zarurat nahi hai uska sangrah mat karo. Aapke haathon mein sampatti samaj ke liye hai, aur aap uske trustee hain.'
author: Mahavira

quote: 'Ahimsa aur jeevon ke prati daya swayam ke prati daya hai.'
author: Mahavira

quote: Apne aap par vijay paana ek lakh shatruon par vijay paane se behtar hai.
author: Mahavira

quote: Kya tum kisi ke kehne par ek garam lohe ki chhadi ko apne haath mein pakad sakte ho? To phir, kya yeh uchit hai ki tum apni ichha poori karne ke liye doosron se aisa karne ko kaho? Agar tum doosron ke shabdon aur karmo se apne sharir aur man par hone wali peeda ko bardasht nahi kar sakte, to tumhe kya adhikar hai ki apne shabdon aur karmo ke madhyam se doosron ko dukh pahunchao? Dusron ke saath wahi vyavhaar karo jo tum apne saath chahte ho. Kisi bhi jeev, chahe pashu ho ya manushya, par ki gayi hinsa utni hi hanikarak hai jitni wo swayam tumhare liye hoti.
author: Mahavira

quote: Dusron ke saath wahi vyavhaar karo jo tum apne saath chahte ho. Kisi bhi jeev, chahe pashu ho ya manushya, par ki gayi hinsa utni hi hanikarak hai jitni wo swayam tumhare liye hoti.
author: Mahavira

quote: 'Moh aur dwesh karma ka mool karan hain, aur karma moh se utpann hota hai. Karma janm aur mrityu ka mool karan hai, jo dukh ka strot kaha gaya hai. Koi bhi apne ateet ke karmo ke prabhav se bach nahi sakta.'
author: Mahavira

quote: 'Emaanadaari ke madhyam se vyakti sharirik, maansik aur bhaashik saralta prapt karta hai, jo vaani aur karmon mein samanta laati hai.'
author: Mahavira

quote: 'Agar tum ek aadat ko viksit karna chahte ho, to bina kisi samarpan ke uska abhyas karo jab tak wo tumhare charitra ka ang na ban jaye. Jab tak yeh sthir na ho jaye, tab tak koi chhoot ya prayas mein kami na rakho.'
author: Mahavira

quote: 'Ek vyakti jo jalti hui jungle ke beech ek ped ke upar baitha hai, sabhi praaniyon ko nash hota dekh raha hai. Lekin wo yeh nahi samajhta ki uska bhi yahi bhavishya hone wala hai. Aisa vyakti moorkh hai.'
author: Mahavira

quote: 'Sabhi saans lene wale, jeevit aur chetan praniyon ko na maaro, na unke saath hinsa karo, na unka apmaan karo, na unhe peeda do aur na unhe bhagaao.'
author: Mahavira

quote: 'Jo vyakti prithvi, vayu, agni, jal aur vanaspati ke astitva ko nazarandaz karta hai, wo apne astitva ko bhi nazarandaz karta hai jo inse juda hua hai.'
author: Mahavira

quote: 'Ek adharmik vyakti agar jagrit hota hai to doosron ko sula deta hai. Isliye uska sona achha hai. Ek dharmik vyakti agar jagrit hota hai to doosron ko jagata hai. Isliye uska jagna achha hai.'
author: Mahavira

quote: 'Agar koi vyakti din bhar ke ghatnaon ka punarvichar karein to use niyamit roop se nirdharit samay par karna chahiye. Aisa nahi ki aaj karein, kal na karein aur phir chauthe din shuru karein. Aisi aniyamitta punarvichar ki aadat ko sthir nahi hone deti.'
author: Mahavira

quote: 'Jo kuch bhi tumhari zarurat nahi hai uska sangrah mat karo. Tumhare haathon mein adhik dhan samaj ke liye hai aur tum us dhan ke trustee ho.'
author: Mahavira

quote: Hum bhai-chare ka prachar aur palan karte hain  sirf manushya ke liye nahi balki sabhi jeevon ke liye  sirf ravivaar ko nahi balki hafte ke har din. Hum vishwa nyay ke niyam mein vishwas rakhte hain  ki hamari vartamaan sthiti hamare ateet ke karmo ka parinaam hai aur hum kisi avashyak, gairzimmedar shasak ke anuchit faislon ke adheen nahi hain. Hamara uddhaar hamare apne karmo aur kriyaon par nirbhar karta hai, na ki kisi vakeel ki bali par.
author: Virchand Raghavji Gandhi

quote: Agar ek vyakti ka man badle ki bhavna aur irshya se prabhavit hai, to wo prem aur sah-anubhuti vyakt nahi kar sakta. Aur agar wo doosron ke prati prem aur sah-anubhuti dikhata bhi hai, to uska koi achha parinaam nahi hoga. Aise vichar prem mein nahi, balki dwesh mein prakat hote hain.
author: Virchand Raghavji Gandhi

quote: Har vyakti Mahavira ko apni bhasha mein samajhta. Sher bakri ke saath baithta, aur raja bhikhari ke saath. Har vyakti ek dusre ka samman karta, kyunki ve apne padosi mein ek jeevit atma dekhte, kewal ek sharir nahi.
author: Manoj Jain

quote: Jain shiksha tarkik tarkon par nirbhar nahi karti; balki unki maanyata ka ekmatra aur poorn pramaan Tirthankar ki sarvagyata hai. Yeh shiksha kewal ek vishesh uddeshya ke liye prastut ki gayi hai  sansaarik bandhan se mukti prapt karna.
author: Lawrence A. Babb

quote: Ek hi Bhagwan hai. Uska naam Satya hai; wo rachnakarta hai. Wo kisi se nahi darta; usme nafrat nahi hai. Wo kabhi marta nahi; wo janm aur mrityu ke chakra se pare hai. Wo swayam prakaashit hai. Uska gyaan sachche Guru ki kripa se hota hai. Wo shuru mein sach tha; yugon ke aarambh mein sach tha aur hamesha sach rahega. Wo ab bhi sach hai.
author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji

quote: Nanak naam jahaz hai, chadhe so utre paar, Jo sharda kar sevde, gur paar utaran haar. O Nanak, Bhagwan ka naam ek jahaz hai, jo is sansaar ke samundar ko paar karne ke liye savar hota hai. Jo bhi shraddha ke saath seva karta hai, Guru uski madad karta hai paar utarne mein.
author: Dohra

quote: Jo bhi aaya hai, wo jayega; sabki baari aayegi.
author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji

quote: Mrityu pehle se hi tay hoti hai, aur manushya is sansaar mein aata hai.
author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji

quote: Apne man ko jeeto aur duniya ko jeet lo.
author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji

quote: Usse bura kyun kaho? Usse raja paida hote hain.
author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji

quote: Wahi bolo jo tumhe samman dilaye.
author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji

quote: Jinhone prem kiya hai, wahi Bhagwan ko paaye hain.
author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji

quote: 'Bhagwan jaanta hai humare liye kya sahi ya galat hai.' Hukam Rajayee Chalna Nanak Likheya Naal.
author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji

quote: 'Main na Hindu hoon na Muslim, main Bhagwan ka anuyayi hoon.'
author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji

quote: 'Nanak Naam Chardi Kala Tere Bhane Sarbat da Bhala.'
author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji

quote: 'Sabhna jiya ka ek daata, so mai visar na jaaee.'
author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji

quote: 'Jis vyakti ko apne upar vishwas nahi hota, wo kabhi Bhagwan par vishwas nahi kar sakta.'
author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji

quote: 'Bachchon ka janm, unka palan-poshan aur purushon ka rozana jeevan  in sab cheezon ka karan mahila hoti hai.'
author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji

quote: 'Sirf moorkh is baat par behas karte hain ki maans khana chahiye ya nahi. Ve na satya samajhte hain aur na hi uska dhyan karte hain. Kaun define karega ki maans kya hai aur paudha kya? Kaun jaane paap kahan hota hai  shakahari hone mein ya maansahari hone mein?'
author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji

quote: Agar ek hi Bhagwan hai, to us tak pahunchne ka ek hi raasta hai, aur koi nahi. Us raaste par chalna chahiye aur doosre ko tyagna chahiye. Uski pooja karo jo amar hai aur poore brahmand mein samaya hua hai, na ki uski jo janm lekar marne ke liye aaya hai.
author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji

quote: Raja aur samraat, jo dhan aur samrajya ke pahaadon ke malik hain, bhi ek chinti ke barabar nahi ho sakte jo Bhagwan ke prem se bhari hui hai.
author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji

quote: Prabhu ke geet gao, Prabhu ke Naam ki seva karo, aur uske sevakon ke sevak bano.
author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji

quote: Guru ke shabdon ka gaayan karke, maine, ek gayak ne, Prabhu ki mahima failayi. Nanak, Sachche Naam ki stuti karke maine poorn Prabhu ko prapt kiya.
author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji

quote: Nanak, poora sansaar dukh mein hai. Jo Naam par vishwas karta hai, wahi vijayi hota hai.
author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji

quote: Ek paudha boya jaye aur doosra ug jaye, aisa nahi ho sakta; jo beej boya jata hai, wahi paudha ugta hai.
author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji

quote: 'Tyaag tapasya mein nahi hai, na hi tapasvi vastra mein ya chhadi mein. Tapasya na baliyan mein hai aur na mundan mein ya shankh bajane mein. Tapasya ashuddhiyon ke beech shuddh rehne mein hai.'
author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji

quote: 'Bhagwan ki kripa ko masjid banao aur bhakti ko namaaz ka chatai. Quran ko achhe aacharan banao.'
author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji

quote: 'Jo bhi beej khet mein boya jata hai, usi prakaar ka paudha ugta hai jo us beej ke gunon se chinhnit hota hai.'
author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji

quote: 'Oochi buddhi se man oochi sochta hai, lekin ek makkhi bhi mithai ke saath kha leta hai.'
author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji

quote: 'Sansarik prem ko jala do, uske raakh ko ghis kar syahi banao; apne dil ko kalam banao, buddhi ko lekhak banao aur wahi likho jo anant aur seemaheen ho.'
author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji

quote: 'Santan ka janm, unka palan-poshan aur purushon ka sukhmay jeevan  in sab cheezon ka karan sirf patni hoti hai.'
author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji

quote: 'Apne hi ghar mein shanti se raho aur maut ka sandeshvahak tumhe chhoo nahi paayega.'
author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji

quote: Raja aur samraat, jo dhan ke pahaadon aur samrajya ke samudron ke malik hain, bhi ek chinti ke barabar nahi ho sakte jo Bhagwan ko nahi bhoolti.
author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji

quote: Yeh duniya ek natak hai, jo ek sapne mein prastut ki gayi hai.
author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji

quote: Maut buri nahi kehlayegi, he logon, agar koi sahi tarike se marna jaane.
author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji

quote: 'Main na purush hoon, na stri, aur na hi nirlingik. Main shanti ka roop hoon, jo swayam-prakashit aur tejomay hai.'
author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji

quote: 'Main na ek baccha hoon, na ek yuva, aur na hi vriddh; aur main kisi jaati ka bhi nahi hoon.'
author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji

quote: 'Aapki daya hi meri samaajik sthiti hai.'
author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji

quote: 'Satya ka gyaan sabse uchit hai. Lekin usse bhi uchit hai satya ka jeevan.'
author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji

quote: 'Jo sabhi manushyon ko saman nazar se dekhta hai wahi dharmik hai.'
author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji

quote: 'Neeche aur neeche aur bhi duniyaan hain, aur unke upar sau hazaar aakaash hain. Koi bhi Bhagwan ki seema aur seema-rekha nahi jaan saka. Agar Bhagwan ka koi hisaab ho to kewal ek manushya hi likh sakta hai; lekin Bhagwan ka hisaab kabhi khatam nahi hota, aur manushya khud likhte-likhte mar jata hai.'
author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji

quote: 'Yogi ko kis baat ka dar hona chahiye? Ped, paudhe aur jo kuch bhi andar aur bahar hai, wahi Bhagwan swayam hai.'
author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji

quote: 'Main janma nahi hoon, to mere liye janm ya mrityu kaise ho sakti hai?'
author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji

quote: 'Agar log Bhagwan dwara diye gaye dhan ka upyog sirf apne liye ya uska sangrah karne ke liye karte hain, to yeh ek laash ki tarah hai. Lekin agar ve ise doosron ke saath baantne ka faisla karte hain, to yeh pavitra bhojan ban jata hai.'
author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji

quote: 'Tyaag kewal shabdon mein nahi hota; tyaagi wahi hai jo sabko saman roop se dekhta hai. Tyaag kabristan jaane mein nahi hai; yeh idhar-udhar ghoomne ya teerth sthal par snan karne mein bhi nahi hai. Tyaag ashuddhiyon ke beech shuddh rehne mein hai.'
author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji

quote: Bhagwan ek hai, lekin uske anek roop hain. Wo sabka rachnakarta hai aur swayam manushya roop dharan karta hai.
author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji

quote: Rassi ke gyaan ki kami ke karan, rassi ek saanp lagti hai; Atma ke gyaan ki kami ke karan, vyakti apne seemit aur bhoutik roop ko apnata hai.
author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji

quote: Duniya mein koi bhi vyakti bhram mein na rahe. Guru ke bina koi bhi doosre tat par nahi pahunch sakta.
author: Guru Nanak Dev Ji

quote: Jo Prabhu ki stuti nahi karta, uska jeevan vyarth hai. Nanak kehte hain, Prabhu ka dhyan karo aur apne man ko usme dooba do, jaise machhli paani mein rehti hai.
author: Guru Tegh Bahadur Ji  Salok Mahalla 9 verse 1

quote: Apna sir de do, lekin unka saath mat chhodo jinki raksha ka tumne sankalp liya hai. Apni jaan de do, lekin apne vishwas ko mat tyago.
author: Guru Tegh Bahadur Sahib Ji

quote: Is bhoutik sansaar ki nashwar aur bhrammayi prakriti ka sahi gyaan tabhi hota hai jab vyakti dukh mein hota hai.
author: Guru Tegh Bahadur Sahib Ji

quote: 'Jo vyakti prashansa aur ninda ko saman samajhta hai, jise lobh aur moh prabhavit nahi karte, use hi gyaanwan samjho. Jo dukh aur sukh mein bandha nahi hota, wahi mukt hota hai.'
author: Guru Tegh Bahadur Sahib Ji

quote: 'Jo apne ahankaar ko jeet leta hai aur Prabhu ko sab kuch karne wala samajhta hai, wahi 'Jivan Mukti' prapt karta hai. Yeh sach jaan lo, Nanak kehte hain.'
author: Guru Tegh Bahadur Ji

quote: 'He maa, mujhe Prabhu ke Naam ka dhan prapt hua hai. Mera man shanti mein sthir ho gaya hai. Lobh aur sansarik prem mujhe chhoo bhi nahi sakte, aur divya gyaan mujhe bhar deta hai. Lalach aur ichha mujhe prabhavit nahi kar sakte. Main poori tarah Prabhu ki bhakti mein dooba hua hoon.'
author: Guru Tegh Bahadur Ji

quote: 'Usne tumhe tumhara sharir aur dhan diya, lekin tum usse prem nahi karte. Nanak kehte hain, tum pagal ho! Ab tum kyun itne bekaar hokar kaamp rahe ho?'
author: Guru Tegh Bahadur Ji  Salok Mahalla 9 verse 7

quote: Jo kuch bhi rachit kiya gaya hai, wo nash ho jayega; har koi, aaj ya kal, nash ho jayega. O Nanak, Prabhu ki Mahima gao aur sabhi anya uljhanon ko tyag do.
author: Guru Tegh Bahadur Ji  Salok Mahalla 9 verse 52

quote: Jungleon mein kyun dhoondhne jaate ho (usse paane ke liye). Jo sabke hriday mein baste hain lekin sadaiv pavitra rehte hain, wo tumhare hriday mein bhi samaye hue hain. Jaise gulaab ki sugandh usme hoti hai aur darpan mein pratibimb hota hai, waise hi Prabhu bina kisi rukawat ke sab jagah vyapt hain; unhe apne andar dhoondo. Guru ne yeh gyaan diya hai ki Om sab jagah vyapt hai  andar bhi aur bahar bhi. Nanak kehte hain, jab tak tum swayam ko nahi jaanoge, tab tak sanshay ka mail nahi mitega.
author: Guru Tegh Bahadur Ji

quote: Tumhara jeevan vyarth ja raha hai. Din aur raat tum dharmik granthon ko sunte ho lekin satya ko nahi samajhte, he agyaani vyakti. Mrityu tumhari or badh rahi hai aur tum usse bachne ke liye kahin bhaag nahi sakte. Tumhara sharir, jise tum sthayi samajhte ho, mitti mein mil jayega; tum Bhagwan ko kyun yaad nahi karte, he laj aur gyaan se rahit vyakti? Nanak, jo Bhagwan ka sevak hai, tumse kehta hai apne man ka garv chhod do aur Bhagwan ki bhakti karo aur isi tarah is duniya mein apna jeevan bitao.
author: Guru Tegh Bahadur Ji

quote: Uski stuti gaane se tumhari ashuddhi door hogi aur ahankaar ka vish nasht ho jayega.
author: Guru Tegh Bahadur Ji

quote: Us vyakti ko Bhagwan ka roop samjho jo din-raat Bhagwan ka dhyan karta hai. Bhagwan aur uske sevak ke beech koi antar nahi hota  ise satya samjho.
author: Guru Tegh Bahadur Ji

quote: Jo vyakti Bhagwan ko rachnakarta maan kar apne ahankaar ko tyag deta hai, wahi mukti prapt karega; is satya ko jaan lo, he mere man.
author: Guru Tegh Bahadur Ji

quote: 'Agar haath, pair ya sharir mitti se dhak jayein to unhe paani se saaf kiya jata hai. Agar kapde ashuddh ho jayein to unhe sabun se saaf kiya jata hai. Agar buddhi paap se ashuddh ho jaye to Naam ke prem se usse pavitra banaya jata hai.'
author: Guru Tegh Bahadur Ji

quote: 'Naam raha, Sant rahe aur Bhagwan rahe. Nanak kehte hain, is duniya mein koi birla hi Guru ke mantra ka paath karta hai.'
author: Guru Tegh Bahadur Ji

quote: 'Tum insaan bankar paida hue lekin ek pal ke liye bhi Bhagwan ko yaad nahi kiya. Tum vasanaon ke daas ban gaye aur apne pair bandhanon mein jakad liye.'
author: Guru Tegh Bahadur Ji

quote: 'He manushya, tera kya hoga? Tumne is duniya mein Bhagwan ke Naam par dhyan nahi diya aur poori tarah indriya tripti mein doobe rahe aur apna man inse door nahi kiya.'
author: Guru Tegh Bahadur Ji

quote: 'Prabhu ke Naam aur uski Mahima ka dhyan subah ke amritvela mein karo. Hamare karm hume yeh sharir dete hain, lekin mukti ka dwar uski kripa se khulta hai.'
author: Guru Tegh Bahadur Ji

quote: 'He manushya, is satya ko apne man mein dridh kar lo; yeh poora sansaar ek sapne ki tarah hai aur ek sapne ki tarah jaldi hi khatam ho jayega. Ek insaan rait ki deewar banata hai lekin wo thodi der bhi tik nahi sakti. Isi tarah Maya (bhram) ke sukh asthayi hote hain; tum inmein kyun uljhe ho, he agyaani vyakti?'
author: Guru Tegh Bahadur Ji

quote: 'Prabhu ki aradhana karo, he manushya, tumhara jeevan tezi se beet raha hai. Main tumse baar-baar kya kahoon? Tum samajhte nahi ho, he agyaani vyakti: Tumhara sharir jaldi hi ole ki tarah pighal jayega. Sabhi sanshay chhod do aur Prabhu ke Naam ka dhyan karo. Ant mein yahi tumhare saath rahega. Indriya tripti ko zehar ki tarah chhod do aur Hari ki stuti apne hriday mein basao. Nanak, jo Prabhu ka sevak hai, tumhe yaad dilata hai  tumhara samay nikalta ja raha hai.'
author: Guru Tegh Bahadur Ji

quote: Ram ko yaad karo, usse yaad rakho. Yeh tumhare liye hamesha faydemand hoga. Moh ko chhodo aur uska ashray lo. Sansaarik sukh ko asthayi samjho; yeh sab kuch alpkaalik hai. Dhan, jis par tum itna garv karte ho, ek sapne ki tarah chala jayega; poore sansaar ka samrajya ek rait ki deewar hai. Prabhu ke sevak Nanak kehte hain, sharir nash ho jayega. Kal pal-pal karke guzar gaya, aaj bhi usi tarah guzar raha hai.
author: Guru Tegh Bahadur Ji

quote: Yoga na to phate hue kapdon mein hai aur na hi danda aur sharir par raakh malne mein. Na hi yoga ka arth baliyan pehnna ya baal mundwana hai, na shankh bajane mein. Yoga tab hota hai jab hum sansaarik vasanaon ke beech nirdosh rehte hain. Keval baatein karne se koi vyakti yogi nahi ban jata. Jo sabhi manushyon ko saman nazar se dekhta hai, wahi yogi kehlata hai.
author: Guru Tegh Bahadur Ji

quote: He manushya, din aur raat use yaad karo. Tumhara jeevan har pal ek tooti hui matki se paani ke tarah behta ja raha hai. Tum Hari ki stuti kyun nahi gaate, he agyaani vyakti? Tum mrityu ko bhool gaye ho aur jhoothe lobh mein uljhe ho. Agar ab bhi tum Hari ki stuti karo, to kuch bhi nahi khoya jayega. Nanak kehte hain, Hari ki bhakti ke madhyam se tum nirbhay avastha prapt karoge.
author: Guru Tegh Bahadur Ji

quote: Jag jao, he man, jag jao: tum kyun laaparwahi se so rahe ho? Jo sharir tumhare saath janma tha, wo tumhare saath nahi jayega jab tum is duniya se jaoge. Maa, pita, santaan aur anya rishtedaar, jinse tum jude hue ho, tumhare sharir ko jalayenge jab jeevan usse chhod dega. Samajh lo ki duniya ke saath tumhara sambandh sirf tab tak hai jab tak tum zinda ho. Tumhari mrityu par sab kuch ek sapne ki tarah khatam ho jayega; isliye Hari ki stuti gao.
author: Guru Tegh Bahadur Ji

quote: 'Jo vyakti dukh mein prabhavit nahi hota, jise sukh ka moh nahi hota aur jo sona ko mitti ke saman samajhta hai; jo na kisi ki prashansa karta hai aur na kisi ki burai karta hai; jisme na lobh hai, na moh aur na garv; jo sukh aur dukh se pare rehta hai aur samman ya apmaan ki chinta nahi karta; jo sabhi aashaon aur ichhaon ko tyag deta hai; jise vasana aur krodh chhoo bhi nahi sakte  aise vyakti ke hriday mein Brahma niwas karta hai.'
author: Guru Tegh Bahadur Ji

quote: 'Us vyakti ko yogi mat samjho jiske man mein lobh, dhan aur sansarik vasanaon ka moh ho. Yogi wahi hai jo na kisi ki prashansa karta hai aur na burai karta hai, jo sona aur loha ko saman samajhta hai aur jo sukh aur dukh se pare ho gaya ho. Jo vyakti apne man ko sthir kar leta hai jo das dishaon mein bhatak raha tha, wahi mukt vyakti kehlata hai.'
author: Guru Tegh Bahadur Ji

quote: 'Achhe log: apne man ka garv chhod do. Din-raat vasana, krodh aur buray logon ki sangati se door raho. Jo sukh aur dukh, samman aur apmaan ko saman samajhta hai aur anand aur shok se pare ho jata hai  wahi satya ko jaanta hai.'
author: Guru Tegh Bahadur Ji

quote: 'Ab mujhe Naam ka heera mil gaya hai, mere man se sabhi ichhaen door ho gayi hain: mera man ab anand mein dooba hua hai.'
author: Guru Tegh Bahadur Ji

quote: 'He maa, mujhe Bhagwan ke Naam ka dhan prapt hua hai. Mera man idhar-udhar bhatakna chhod chuka hai  ab use shanti mil gayi hai.'
author: Guru Tegh Bahadur Ji

quote: 'Jo vyakti Bhagwan ki bhakti nahi karta uska jeevan vyarth gaya  is baat ko yaad rakho.'
author: Guru Tegh Bahadur Ji

quote: 'Hari ke Naam ke bina manushya dukhon ka shikar hota hai; bhakti ke bina sanshay door nahi hota  Guru ne yeh rahasya prakat kiya.'
author: Guru Tegh Bahadur Ji

quote: 'Jo vyakti prashansa aur ninda ko saman samajhta hai aur jise lobh ya moh prabhavit nahi karte  usi vyakti ko gyaanwan samjho.'
author: Guru Tegh Bahadur Ji

quote: Achhe logon, shanti tabhi milti hai jab vyakti Hari ka sharan leta hai. Ved aur Puran ka adhyayan Bhagwan ke Naam ki yaad dilana chahiye. Jo vyakti lobh, moh, dhan, sansarik vasana aur indriya tripti se prabhavit nahi hota aur jiske liye sukh aur dukh saman hain, wahi Bhagwan ka roop hai.
author: Guru Tegh Bahadur Ji

quote: Garv aur sansarik moh ko tyag do aur apne hriday ko Bhagwan ki aradhana mein lagao. Nanak kehte hain, yeh mukti ka marg hai  Guru ki shiksha ke madhyam se ise pao.
author: Guru Tegh Bahadur Ji

quote: Bhagwan ki stuti gao, achhe logon; tumhe amulya manav janm prapt hua hai: ise vyarth kyun gawate ho? Us Bhagwan ka sharan lo jo paapiyon ko pavitra karta hai aur santon ka sahara hai. Usse kyun bhoolte ho, jinki yaad se haathi ne apne bhay se chutkara paaya?
author: Guru Tegh Bahadur Ji

quote: He santo, ahankaar ko tyag do aur hamesha vasana, krodh aur buray sangati se door raho. Dukh aur sukh, samman aur apmaan ko saman samajhna chahiye. Prashansa aur ninda, dono ko tyag dena chahiye aur mukti ki khoj bhi chhod deni chahiye. Yeh ek bahut kathin marg hai aur koi birla hi (Gurmukh) dharmik vyakti ise chalna jaanta hai.
author: Guru Tegh Bahadur Ji

quote: Jo vyakti dukh mein shok nahi karta aur sukh mein harshit nahi hota, jo bhay aur moh se mukt hai, jiske liye sona aur mitti saman hain; jo prashansa aur ninda (chaplusi aur apmaan) ko tyag chuka hai aur jisme lobh, sansarik moh aur garv nahi hain  jab dayaalu Guru apne kripa se shishya ko ashirvad dete hain tabhi shishya is divya aatmik avastha ko prapt karta hai aur Prabhu mein sammilit ho jata hai jaise paani paani mein milta hai.
author: Guru Tegh Bahadur Ji

quote: Bhagwan swayam hi maaf karne wale hain.
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: Mehnat karo aur aalas mat karo.
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: Pavitra shabdon ka abhyas jeevan mein karo.
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: Naam ke bina shanti nahi hai.
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: Kisi ke kaam ko chugli karke barbaad mat karo.
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: Din-raat, hamesha Prabhu ka dhyan karo.
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: Jo sabhi manushyon ko saman nazar se dekhta hai wahi dharmik hai.
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: Chugli mat karo, na kisi ki burai karo, aur na hi kisi ke prati dvesh rakho.
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: 'Main un logon ke charnon mein girta hoon jo Sachche ke Sachche ka dhyan karte hain.'
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: 'Prabhu swayam hi raasta dikhate hain, aur swayam hi sab kuch karte hain.'
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: 'Main us Guru par sadaiv balihar jaata hoon jinhone mujhe Prabhu ki seva karna sikhaya.'
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: 'Main us Guru par balihar jaata hoon jo Prabhu ki shiksha ka paath padhate hain.'
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: 'Yeh sansaar andha aur agyaani hai, jo dohray prem mein uljha hua karm karta hai.'
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: 'Jitna ho sake, videshiyon, zaruratmandon ya pareshani mein pade logon ki seva aur madad karo.'
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: 'Ahankaar mein vyakti bhay se ghir jata hai aur apni zindagi poori tarah pareshani mein bitaata hai.'
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: 'Agar tum mazboot ho, to kamzor par atyachar mat karo, aur apne samrajya par kulhaadi mat maaro.'
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: 'Shri Guru Granth Sahib Ji ko gyaan aur pragya ke margdarshak ke roop mein maano aur sweekar karo.'
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: 'Bina Guru ke koi bhi Prabhu ke Naam ko nahi paa sakta, he mere bhaagya ke saathiyon.'
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: 'Main sach bolta hoon; sab suno. Sirf wahi jo prem karte hain, Prabhu ko samajh sakte hain.'
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: Agyaani vyakti poori tarah andha hota hai. Wo heere ki keemat nahi samajhta.
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: Jab sabhi galat ka sudhar karne ke upaay asafal ho jayein, tab talwar uthana pavitra aur uchit hai.
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: Har din Kirtan sunne aur Gurbani ke saar par charcha mein bhaag lo.
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: Yeh lagbhag asambhav hai ki tum ab yahan ho jab tum sochte ho ki kahin aur hona chahiye.
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: Jo hamesha shanti mein rehte hain aur bilkul pavitra hote hain, wo Sachche Guru ki seva karte hain.
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: Unka poora jeevan safal hota hai jo apne man mein Prabhu ke Naam ki bhukh mehsoos karte hain.
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: 'Dhanya hai, Dhanya hai Sachche Guru, jinhone Prabhu ke Naam ka param uphaar diya.'
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: 'Ahankaar ek bhayanak rog hai, vyakti marta hai, punarjanm leta hai aur aata-jata rehta hai.'
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: 'Sachche Guru se milne par bhukh door hoti hai, lekin ek bhikhari ke vastra pehnne se bhukh door nahi hoti.'
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: 'Sabse bada sukh aur sthayi shanti tab prapt hoti hai jab vyakti apne andar se swarth ko mita deta hai.'
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: 'Jo Guru ke shabdon ke madhyam se Prabhu ki aradhana karte hain, wo apna dukh aur peeda bhool jaate hain.'
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: 'Dusre ka khoon apni talwar se bekaar mein mat bahao, warna uparwali talwar tumhari gardan par gir jayegi.'
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: Main hamesha apne Sachche Guru ke charnon mein naman karta hoon, unse milkar maine Prabhu ke Naam ko jaana hai.
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: Wahi vyakti sachcha insaan hai jo apne vachan ka palan karta hai, na ki ek baat dil mein rakhta hai aur doosri zabaan par.
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: Apne hi astitva ke ghar mein shanti se raho, aur mrityu ka sandeshvahak tumhe chhoo nahi paayega.
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: Jab sab kuch karke bhi nyay nazar na aaye, tab talwar uthana uchit hai, tab ladna sahi hai.
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: Ek Bhagwan ki aradhana karo jo sabka Swami hai. Jaano ki uska roop ek hai aur wo ek hi prakash sab mein vyapt hai.
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: Sabhi Sachche Guru ki stuti aur prashansa karo, jinhone hume Prabhu ki bhakti ka khazana prapt karaya.
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: Jo apne vichar aur karmon mein satya ke path par chalte hain, unpar Prabhu apni daya barsate hain aur unhe karuna prapt hoti hai.
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: Shatruon ke saath vyavhar karte samay kootniti apnao, vibhinna yojnaayein prayog karo aur yudh mein jaane se pehle sabhi tarike apnao.
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: 'Mrityu ke nagar mein gahra andhera aur dhool ke bade baadal hain, wahan na behen hai na bhai. Yeh sharir kamzor hai, vriddhavastha ise gher rahi hai.'
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: 'Jab main chidiya ko baaz se ladwata hoon, jab main bhediyon ko sher banata hoon, jab main ek ko ek lakh se ladwata hoon, tab mujhe Gobind Singh kaha jata hai.'
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: 'Prabhu ko kabhi sthapit ya rachit nahi kiya ja sakta; nirakar swaroop swayam mein poorn hai. Mrityu buri nahi kehlayegi, he logon, agar koi sahi tarike se marna jaane.'
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: 'Iss uddeshya ke liye mera janm hua tha, sabhi dharmik log samajh lein. Mera janm dharm ko aage badhane, achhon ko mukt karne aur buray karm karne walon ko jad se mitaane ke liye hua tha.'
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: 'Dhanya hai wo Sikh jo Sachche Guru ke charnon mein girta hai. Dhanya hai wo Sikh jo apne mukh se Prabhu ka Naam ucharan karta hai.'
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: Main Guru par balihar jaata hoon, jinhone mujhe ahankaar ke ghatak rog se poori tarah mukti dilayi. Guru ke gun mahima aur mahan hain, jinhone burai ko mita diya aur mujhe sadgun sikhaye.
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: Jo mujhe Bhagwan kehte hain, wo gehre narak mein girenge. Mujhe uska ek das samjho aur ismein koi sandeh mat rakho. Main Paramatma ka sevak hoon aur is jeevan ke adbhut natak ko dekhne aaya hoon.
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: 'Karta' aur 'Karim' ek hi Bhagwan ke naam hain. 'Razak' aur 'Rahim' bhi usi ke naam hain. Kisi vyakti ko apne bhram mein naamon ke antar par vivad nahi karna chahiye.
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: Main duniya mein dharm ko har jagah sthapit karne, paap aur burai ko mitaane ke kartavya ke saath aaya hoon. Mera janm ka ek hi uddeshya tha ki dharm ka vikas ho, achchai jeevit rahe aur atyachari jad se ukhad diye jayein.
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: 'Aankhein band karke aur bagule ki tarah dhyan lagane se koi fayda nahi hai. Jo log samudron mein snan karte hain aur moksha ki ichha rakhte hain, unka yeh sansaar bhi vyarth hai aur agla bhi. Main sach bolta hoon; sab suno  Bhagwan sirf prem ke madhyam se prapt hota hai.'
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: 'Sabhi manushyon ki aankhein, kaan aur sharir ek jaise hain jo prithvi, vayu, agni aur jal se bane hain. Allah aur Abhekh ek hi Bhagwan ke naam hain; wahi Puranon aur Quran mein ullekhit hai. Sabhi manushya ek hi Parmatma ka pratibimb hain. Sampoorna manav jaati ko ek samajho.'
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: 'He Prabhu, meri prarthana suno ki main kabhi achhe karm karne se na hatoon. Jab main yudh mein jaun to mujhe shatru ka bhay na ho aur dridh sankalp ke saath vijayi ho jaun. Main apne man ko sirf tumhari stuti gaane ki shiksha doon. Aur jab samay aaye, to main yudh ke maidan mein veerta se ladte hue maroon.'
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: 'Jo dharmik roop dharan karta hai wo Bhagwan ko zara bhi prasann nahi karta. He logon, is baat ko apne man mein spasht samajh lo ki Bhagwan dikhave se nahi milta. Jo kapat karte hain, wo parlok mein mukti prapt nahi karte; wo sirf sansaarik kaam poore karte hain aur raja bhi unki roop-rekha ko poojte hain! Lekin dikhave se Bhagwan nahi milta, chahe jitna bhi khoj lo. Jo apne man ko vash me karta hai wahi Paramatma ko pehchanta hai.'
author: Guru Gobind Singh Ji

quote: Shanti tumhare andar se aati hai. Ise bahar mat dhoondo.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Hazaron khokhle shabdon se ek shabd jo shanti laaye behtar hai.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Dwesh dwesh se khatam nahi hota, sirf prem se khatam hota hai; yeh ek shashwat niyam hai.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Jo log dwesh bhare vicharon se mukt hote hain, ve avashya shanti paate hain.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Agar tum sach mein apne aap se prem karte ho, to tum kabhi kisi aur ko chot nahi pahunchaaoge.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Sabse mahan prarthana dhairya hai.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Shanti samajhne aur jo hai use sweekar karne se aati hai.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Apne prem ko poore sansaar mein failao.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Shanti tumhare andar se shuru hoti hai.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Aise shabdon ka chunav karo jo shanti laayein, na ki vivad.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Prem dwesh ko khatam karne aur shanti paane ki kunji hai.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Samajhna shanti laata hai, chahe paristhiti kitni bhi kathin ho.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Chhoti chhoti cheezon ke liye krutagyata vyakt karo aur unmein shanti pao.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Dwesh bhare vicharon ko chhod do aur sachi shanti pao.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Agar tum apne aap se prem karte ho, to tum doosron ko chot nahi pahunchaaoge.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Shanti cheezon ko jaisa hai vaisa sweekar karne se aati hai.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Dhairya ek shakti hai jo shanti prapt karne mein madad karti hai.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Prem aur daya failao, ek shantipurna duniya banane ke liye.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Shanti prapt karne ke liye dridh sankalp ke saath apne aap ko prashikshit karo.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Duniya se prem karo jaise ek maa apne ekmatra santaan se karti hai.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Dwesh ke badle prem chuno, kyunki prem shanti laata hai.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Prem ki kami mein dukh hota hai. Apne dil ko prem se bharo aur mukt ho jao.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Apne sabhi karm aur nirnay mein prem ko apna margdarshak banao.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Prem sabse bada uphaar hai jo tum de sakte ho aur paa sakte ho.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Prem bina kisi pratiphal ki apeksha ke karo.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Prem ka marg hi pragya ka marg hai.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Prem wo pul hai jo dilon ko jodta hai.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Apne aap se aur doosron se prem karo, kyunki prem hi jeevan ka saar hai.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Prem ko apnao aur tumhe sacha sukh milega.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Sacha prem samajh se janm leta hai.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Duniya se usi tarah prem karo jaise ek maa apne ekmatra santaan se karti hai.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Daya ke saath bolo, kyunki tumhare shabdon mein chot pahunchane ya ilaj karne ki shakti hoti hai.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Vartamaan kshan par dhyan do; yeh karma ka asli saar rakhta hai.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Tumhare karm tumhare bhavishya ke beej bote hain; jo tum doge, wahi tumhe milega.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Karma ek nyaayapriya nyayadhish hai, jo hamare karmon ke anusar parinaam deta hai.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Badla mat lo; karma nyay sunishchit karega.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Apne karma ki visheshta ko apnao; yeh tumhare jeevan ka sundar chitra bunta hai.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Tumhara karma tumhare saath ek vishwasniya chhaya ki tarah rehta hai, isliye apne vichar aur karmon mein satark raho.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Apni aatma ko pavitra karmon ke madhyam se poshan do; apne andar ke bagiche ko khilta dekho.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Karma dwara prastut chunautiyan aatma-vikas ke avsar hote hain; unka samna sahas ke saath karo.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Daya ke karm bahut mahatvapurn hote hain, jo hamare gyaan se pare positivity failate hain.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Past mein mat atko, future ke sapne mat dekho, apne man ko vartamaan kshan par kendrit karo.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Man hi sab kuch hai. Jo tum sochte ho, wahi tum ban jaate ho.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Man aur sharir ke liye swasthya ka rahasya yeh hai ki past ka shok na karo, future ki chinta na karo, lekin vartamaan mein samajhdari aur imaandari se jeevan bitao.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Tum swayam, poore brahmand ke kisi bhi vyakti ke saman, apne prem aur sneha ke hakdaar ho.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Jeevan mein ek hi asli asafalta hai  apne gyaan ke anusar imaandari se jeene mein asafal hona.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Teen cheezein jyada der tak chhupi nahi reh sakti: surya, chandrama aur satya.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Tumhe apne krodh ke liye saja nahi milegi; tumhe krodh ke madhyam se saja milegi.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Ant mein sirf teen baatein mahatvapurn hoti hain: tumne kitna prem kiya, kitna shantipurn jeevan jiya, aur jo tumhare liye nahi tha usse kitni shalinta se chhod diya.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Marg aakash mein nahi hai; marg hriday mein hai.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Khushi is baat par nirbhar nahi karti ki tumhare paas kya hai ya tum kaun ho. Yeh sirf is baat par nirbhar karti hai ki tum kya sochte ho.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Hazaron mombattiyan ek hi mombatti se jalayi ja sakti hain, aur mombatti ki zindagi kam nahi hoti. Khushi kabhi baantne se kam nahi hoti.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Dukh ka mool moh hai.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Khushi zyada paane mein nahi hai, khushi zyada dene mein hai.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Khushi un logon ke paas kabhi nahi aati jo un cheezon ki kadar nahi karte jo unke paas pehle se hain.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Swasthya sabse bada uphaar hai, santosh sabse bada dhan hai, aur vishwas sabse achha sambandh hai.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Utho aur krutagyata vyakt karo, agar aaj humne zyada nahi seekha to kam se kam thoda seekha, aur agar thoda bhi nahi seekha to kam se kam bimar nahi pade, aur agar bimar pade to kam se kam mare nahi; isliye sabhi krutagyata vyakt karein.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Khushi baahari paristhitiyon par nirbhar nahi karti; yeh humare manasik drishtikon se niyantrit hoti hai.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Khushi ka rahasya yeh nahi hai ki jo pasand ho wo karo, balki jo karte ho usse pasand karo.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Sacha prem samajhne se janm leta hai.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Samasya yeh hai ki tum sochte ho tumhare paas samay hai.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Sharir ko swasth rakhna ek kartavya hai... warna hum apne man ko majboot aur spasht nahi rakh paayenge.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Tumhara kaam apni duniya ko khojna hai aur phir poore dil se usme samarpit ho jaana hai.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Tumhe khud hi mehnat karni hogi. Buddha sirf raasta dikhate hain.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Tum poore brahmand mein khoj kar lo, lekin tumse zyada tumhare prem aur sneha ke yogya koi nahi milega. Tum swayam poore brahmand ke kisi bhi vyakti ke saman apne prem aur sneha ke hakdaar ho.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Apne vicharon se hi hum duniya ka nirmaan karte hain.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Ant mein, yeh cheezein sabse zyada mahatvapurn hoti hain: Tumne kitna prem kiya? Tumne kitna poora jeevan jiya? Tumne kitni gehraai se chhod diya?
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Tum tab tak raaste par nahi chal sakte jab tak tum khud raasta na ban jao.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Sab kuch samajhna hi sab kuch maaf karna hai.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Apne uddhaar ke liye khud kaam karo. Dusron par nirbhar mat raho.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Kisi bhi baat ko mat maano, chahe tumne kahin bhi padha ho.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Hume koi aur nahi bachata, sirf hum khud ko bacha sakte hain.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Krodh ko pakad kar rakhna aisa hai jaise zehar peena aur sochna ki doosra vyakti marega.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Past mein mat atko, future ke sapne mat dekho, apne man ko vartamaan kshan par kendrit karo.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Teen cheezein jyada der tak chhupi nahi reh sakti: surya, chandrama aur satya.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Krodh ko pakad kar rakhna aisa hai jaise ek garam koyla pakadna aur sochna ki use doosre vyakti par phenko; tumhi jal jaoge.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Shanti tumhare andar se aati hai. Ise bahar mat dhoondo.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Hume koi aur nahi bachata. Na koi kar sakta hai, na koi karega. Hume khud hi raaste par chalna hoga.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Apne aap ko jeetna hazaron yuddh jeetne se behtar hai. Tab vijay tumhari hai. Isse tumse koi cheen nahi sakta, na devta, na rakshas, na swarg, aur na narak.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Tumhe apne krodh ke liye saja nahi milegi; tumhe krodh ke madhyam se saja milegi.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Ek vyakti ka apna man, uska dushman ya shatru nahi, use burai ke raaste par le jaata hai.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Manzil tak pahunchne se behtar hai achhe se safar karna.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Jaise ek mombatti bina aag ke nahi jal sakti, waise hi manushya bina aadhyatmik jeevan ke nahi jee sakta.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Jo shabd hum bolte hain unka chayan savdhani se karo, kyunki log unhe sunenge aur unka asar achhai ya burai mein hoga.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Jo hum sochte hain, wahi hum bante hain.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Hum wahi hain jo hum sochte hain. Sab kuch jo hum hain, hamare vicharon se utpann hota hai. Apne vicharon se hi hum duniya ka nirmaan karte hain.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Jaise dharti se khazane milte hain, waise hi sadgun achhe karmon se prakat hote hain aur gyaan ek pavitra aur shant man se milta hai. Manav jeevan ki uljhan bhari bhool-bhulaiya mein surakshit chalne ke liye gyaan ka prakash aur sadgunon ka margdarshan zaroori hai.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Ek ghada boond-boond bhar kar bharata hai.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Apne uddhaar ke liye khud kaam karo. Dusron par nirbhar mat raho.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Hazaron khokhle shabdon se ek shabd jo shanti laaye behtar hai.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Jeevan mein ek hi asli asafalta hai  apne gyaan ke anusar imaandari se jeene mein asafal hona.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Jo vyakti ashtangik marg par dridh sankalp ke saath chalta hai, wo nishchit roop se Nirvana prapt karega.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Ek sansarik mahila apne roop aur akar ko pradarshit karne ke liye utsuk rehti hai, chahe wo chal rahi ho, khadi ho, baithi ho ya so rahi ho. Chitra ke roop mein bhi, wo apni sundarta ke akarshan se purushon ke man ko churaane ka ichhuk hoti hai.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Ek vivad mein, jaise hi hume krodh ka ehsaas hota hai, hum satya ki khoj chhod kar apne liye sangharsh karna shuru kar dete hain.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Ek pavitra aur nishkaam jeevan jeene ke liye, vyakti ko samriddhi ke madhya mein bhi kisi cheez ko apna nahi samajhna chahiye.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Main us bhagya ko nahi maanta jo manushyon par girta hai chahe ve kuch bhi karein; lekin main us bhagya ko maanta hoon jo un par girta hai jab tak ve kuch na karein.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Meri twacha, nasen aur haddiyan sukh jayein, mere sharir ka maans aur khoon bhi sukh jayein! Main ise swagat karta hoon! Lekin jab tak main param aur antim gyaan prapt na kar loon, main is jagah se nahi hilunga.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Jo vyakti pachaas logon se prem karta hai uske pachaas dukh hote hain; jo kisi se prem nahi karta uske koi dukh nahi hote.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Main pehla Buddha nahi hoon jo dharti par aaya, aur na hi main antim hunga. Samay aane par ek aur Buddha is duniya mein uthega  ek Pavitra Vyakti, ek param gyaanwan vyakti jo sadachaar mein nipun hoga.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Jo prani agyaan mein jeete hain, jaise ande ke andar band ho, maine sabse pehle agyaan ke chilke ko toda aur poore brahmand mein param Buddhattva prapt kiya.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Sabhi buraiyan man se utpann hoti hain. Agar man badal jaye to kya buraiyan rehengi?'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Jab kisi vyakti ko burai ke prati ghrina hoti hai, jab wo shant rehta hai aur achhi shiksha sunne mein sukh paata hai; tab wo bhay se mukt hota hai.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Jo daan yogya vyaktiyon ko diya jata hai, wo achhi mitti mein boya gaya achha beej hai jo bahut saare phal pradan karta hai. Lekin jo daan un logon ko diya jata hai jo abhi bhi vasanaon ke prabhav mein hain, wo kharab mitti mein boya gaya beej hai. Daan lene wale ki vasanaayein gunon ke vikas ko daba deti hain.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Hazaron mombattiyan ek mombatti se jalayi ja sakti hain, aur mombatti ki zindagi kam nahi hoti. Khushi kabhi baantne se kam nahi hoti.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Humare vichar hume aakar dete hain; hum wahi bante hain jo hum sochte hain. Jab man pavitra hota hai, anand uske saath chhaya ki tarah rehta hai jo kabhi nahi chhodta.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Dwesh dwesh se khatam nahi hota, sirf prem se khatam hota hai; yeh ek shashwat niyam hai.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Tum poore brahmand mein khoj kar lo, lekin tumse zyada tumhare prem aur sneha ke yogya koi nahi milega. Tum swayam, poore brahmand ke kisi bhi vyakti ke saman, apne prem aur sneha ke hakdaar ho.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Swasthya sabse bada uphaar hai, santosh sabse bada dhan hai, aur vishwas sabse achha sambandh hai.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Sharir ko swasth rakhna ek kartavya hai... warna hum apne man ko majboot aur spasht nahi rakh paayenge.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Man hi sab kuch hai. Jo tum sochte ho, wahi tum ban jaate ho.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Satya ke raaste par do hi galtiyan ho sakti hain: ya to poora raasta na chalna, ya shuru hi na karna.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Jo tumne paaya uska adhik mulyankan mat karo, aur doosron se irsha mat karo. Jo doosron se irsha karta hai wo man ki shanti prapt nahi karta.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Jo vyakti samajhdari se jeeta hai uske liye mrityu bhi bhayankar nahi hoti.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Achhe swasthya ka anand lo, apne parivaar mein sachi khushi lao, aur sabko shanti do; iske liye vyakti ko apne man ko anusasit aur niyantrit karna hoga. Agar ek vyakti apne man ko niyantrit kar sakta hai to wo pragya ka marg dhoond lega, aur sabhi gyaan aur sadgun uske paas swayam aa jayenge.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Ekta sirf duality ke madhyam se vyakt ki ja sakti hai. Ekta swayam aur ekta ka vichar dono alag-alag hain.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Jo log dwesh bhare vicharon se mukt hote hain, ve avashya shanti paate hain.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Sabhi sanyukt cheezon mein ashanti hoti hai. Mehnat aur lagan ke saath aage badho.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Jo vyakti daan karta hai uska asli labh hota hai. Jo apne aap ko vash mein karta hai wo mukt hota hai; wo vasanaon ka daas hona chhod deta hai. Dharmik vyakti burai ko tyag deta hai, aur vasana, krodh aur bhram ko jad se mita kar Nirvana prapt karta hai.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Main kabhi ye nahi dekhta ki kya kiya gaya hai; main sirf dekhta hoon ki kya karna baaki hai.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Devi-devtaon ki pooja se behtar hai dharm ke niyam ka palan karna.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: Main duniya mein satya ka raja bankar janma hoon, duniya ke uddhaar ke liye.
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Pair zameen ko tabhi mehsoos karta hai jab wo zameen par lagta hai.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Aalas mrityu tak le jaane ka chhota raasta hai aur mehnat jeevan ka marg hai; murkh log aalsi hote hain, samajhdar log mehnat karte hain.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Swasthya ke bina jeevan jeevan nahi hai; yeh bas ek susti aur dukh ki avastha hai - ek mrityu ka chitra.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Murkh logon ke saath koi sangati nahi hoti. Swaarthi, ahankari, jhagralu aur zid karne wale logon ke saath jeene se behtar hai ek vyakti akela chale.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Chahe tum kitne bhi pavitra shabd padho ya bolo, agar tum un par amal nahi karte to unka koi fayda nahi hoga.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Is duniya mein ek vyakti ka uchit vyavhar kya hona chahiye, jahan har vyakti apne tukde ko pakad kar baitha ho? Ek doosre ke paas se guzarne par logon ke beech uchit abhinandan kya hona chahiye?'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Dharmikta ko burai karne wale log jyada satate hain, achhe log utni prem nahi karte.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Samajhdar log apni vichar dhara se shabdon ko gadhte hain, jaise anaj ko chalni se chhana jata hai.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Sadgun hamesha samuhi roop mein dikhte hain. Ek achhe siddhant ko kabhi kisi ek hriday mein akela nahi paaya gaya.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)

quote: 'Murkh vyakti 'swayam' ka vichar karta hai. Samajhdar vyakti dekhta hai ki 'swayam' ka vichar banane ke liye koi aadhar nahi hai; isliye wo duniya ki sahi samajhta karta hai aur ye nishkarsh nikalta hai ki sabhi sanyukt cheezein jo dukh se bani hain phir se vigalit ho jaayengi, lekin satya sadaiv rahega.'
author: Siddhartha Gautama (Buddha)
